title: Create __init__.py files for package and subpackages
description:
Create:
- src/dictate/__init__.py: __version__ = '0.1.0' only. No eager re-exports (avoid triggering MLX import).
- src/dictate/audio/__init__.py: re-export RingBuffer, VoiceActivityDetector, VadConfig
- src/dictate/model/__init__.py: re-export Qwen3ASRModel, load_qwen3_asr
Keep audio/ and model/ __init__.py imports lazy-safe (these modules import MLX).

title: Verify uv sync and CLI entry points work
description:
Run verification steps:
1. uv sync — ensure package installs in dev mode without errors
2. uv run dictate --help — verify [project.scripts] entry point works
3. uv run stt.py --help — verify thin shim resolves imports correctly
4. uv run dictate --list-devices — verify sounddevice integration works
Fix any import errors, missing modules, or dependency issues discovered.
This is the integration test gate — all prior tasks must be complete.

title: Create transcribe.py with streaming ASR generator
description:
Create src/dictate/transcribe.py. Extract from stt.py lines 885-970:
- transcribe() generator function — streams tokens for low-latency output
- Use collections.abc.Generator not typing.Generator
- Deferred import of mlx_lm.generate.generate_step inside function body
- Uses get_feat_extract_output_lengths from model._utils
- Note: duplicated audio-feature replacement logic exists in both Qwen3ASRModel.__call__ and transcribe(). Keep the transcribe() version (it's the one used at inference time).

title: Create pipeline.py with slimmed RealtimeTranscriber
description:
Create src/dictate/pipeline.py. Refactor RealtimeTranscriber from stt.py lines 986-1568 into orchestration-only class:
- __init__: create RingBuffer, VoiceActivityDetector, UiState; store config
- _audio_callback: thin sounddevice callback (unchanged logic)
- _processor: async loop coordinating audio capture, VAD, periodic ASR
- _display: async loop for UI updates and stdout output
- _handle_turn_complete: orchestrate final transcription + optional analysis
- run: lifecycle (model loading, warmup, stream, signal handling)
Module-level function: is_meaningful(text: str) -> bool
Delegates to: RingBuffer, VoiceActivityDetector, transcribe(), analyze_intent(), ui.render_layout()
All self.ui_* attributes replaced by single UiState instance.

title: Create audio/ring_buffer.py
description:
Create src/dictate/audio/ring_buffer.py. Extract ring buffer logic from RealtimeTranscriber (stt.py lines 1029-1034, 1175-1215):
- RingBuffer class with __slots__
- Factory: classmethod create(max_seconds, sample_rate) -> Self
- Methods: append(frame), get_recent(seconds) -> np.ndarray, reset()
- Properties: filled_seconds, total_samples_written, sample_rate
- Track total_samples_written and last_transcribed_sample internally
- Only depends on numpy

title: Replace root stt.py with thin shim
description:
Replace the root stt.py with a thin shim that imports from the package:
- Keep PEP 723 script metadata block with requires-python>=3.12
- dependencies list: just 'dictate-stt'
- [tool.uv.sources] dictate-stt = { path = '.' }
- Body: from dictate.cli import main; raise SystemExit(main())
- Keep the original docstring as a one-liner
The original full stt.py in docs/ stays unchanged for now (it serves the landing page download).

title: Create config.py with frozen dataclasses and factory
description:
Create src/dictate/config.py. Extract from stt.py lines 180-237:
- AudioEncoderConfig: @dataclass(frozen=True, slots=True) — all fields from original
- TextConfig: @dataclass(frozen=True, slots=True) — all fields from original
- ModelConfig: @dataclass(frozen=True, slots=True) — audio_config, text_config, audio_token_id, support_languages as tuple[str, ...] not list
- Remove __post_init__ mutation. Add make_model_config(raw: dict[str, Any]) -> ModelConfig factory function that resolves nested dicts into frozen sub-configs before constructing the frozen ModelConfig.

title: Create model/_utils.py with tensor math helpers
description:
Create src/dictate/model/_utils.py. Extract from stt.py lines 245-267:
- create_additive_causal_mask(n, offset) -> mx.array
- floor_div(a, b) -> mx.array  (renamed from _floor_div)
- get_feat_extract_output_lengths(input_lengths) -> mx.array (renamed from _get_feat_extract_output_lengths)
Use type statement for aliases: type MaskArray = mx.array
All pure functions, no state. Depends on mlx.core.

title: Create analysis.py with IntentResult and analyze_intent
description:
Create src/dictate/analysis.py. Extract from stt.py lines 978-983, 1268-1298:
- INTENT_EXPLAIN_PROMPT: Final (the prompt template)
- IntentResult: @dataclass(frozen=True, slots=True) with intent, entities, action fields — replaces dict[str, str]
- analyze_intent(text, llm, llm_tokenizer) -> IntentResult — pure function
- Deferred import of mlx_lm.generate.generate inside function body
- Uses suppress_output from dictate.env
- Strips <think>...</think> tags from LLM output

title: Create model/decoder.py with text decoder nn.Modules
description:
Create src/dictate/model/decoder.py. Extract from stt.py lines 550-675:
- TextAttention(nn.Module) — GQA with RoPE, QK-norm
- TextMLP(nn.Module) — SwiGLU
- TextDecoderLayer(nn.Module) — pre-norm transformer block
- TextModel(nn.Module) — embedding + N layers + final RMSNorm
Use @override on __call__ methods. Import config types from dictate.config, create_additive_causal_mask from dictate.model._utils.

title: Create audio/vad.py with VadConfig and VoiceActivityDetector
description:
Create src/dictate/audio/vad.py. Extract VAD logic from RealtimeTranscriber (stt.py lines 1041-1053, 1219-1248):
- VadConfig: @dataclass(frozen=True, slots=True) with frame_ms, mode, silence_ms, sample_rate
- VoiceActivityDetector class with __slots__
- __init__(config: VadConfig) — validates frame_ms in (10,20,30) and mode in 0-3
- process(frame: np.ndarray) -> bool — returns True on turn complete
- reset() — clear state for new turn
- Properties: state ('speech'|'silence'), speech_detected
- Depends on numpy, webrtcvad-wheels, math

title: Create model/__init__.py with re-exports
description:
Create src/dictate/model/__init__.py. Re-export:
- Qwen3ASRModel from dictate.model.asr
- load_qwen3_asr from dictate.model.loader
These are the public API of the model subpackage.

title: Create model/loader.py with load_qwen3_asr function
description:
Create src/dictate/model/loader.py. Extract from stt.py lines 789-877:
- load_qwen3_asr(model_path: str) -> tuple[Qwen3ASRModel, TokenizerLike, FeatureExtractorLike]
- Replace glob.glob with Path.glob
- Use make_model_config() factory from dictate.config
- Keep trust_remote_code=True (required by Qwen3 tokenizer)
- Keep strict=False weight loading (model weight format varies)
Depends on mlx, json, pathlib, huggingface_hub, transformers, config, asr, protocols.

title: Create env.py with environment setup and logging
description:
Create src/dictate/env.py. Extract from stt.py:
- Lines 71-84: warning filters + os.environ setup → setup_environment() function
- Lines 128-142: _suppress_output() context manager → suppress_output() (public name)
- Line 125: LOGGER = logging.getLogger('speech')
Only stdlib imports (contextlib, io, os, logging, warnings). setup_environment() must be called before any MLX imports.

title: Create pyproject.toml with uv project config
description:
Create pyproject.toml at project root with:
- name='dictate-stt', version='0.1.0', requires-python='>=3.12'
- Updated dependencies: mlx>=0.30.0, mlx-lm>=0.30.0, numpy>=2.0, sounddevice>=0.5, transformers>=4.47, huggingface-hub>=0.27, webrtcvad-wheels>=2.0.14, rich>=14.0
- Drop setuptools (unused transitive dep)
- [project.scripts] dictate = 'dictate.cli:main'
- [build-system] hatchling
- [tool.hatch.build.targets.wheel] packages = ['src/dictate']
- Create src/dictate/ directory structure with empty __init__.py files for: dictate/, dictate/model/, dictate/audio/

title: Create ui.py with UiState and pure render functions
description:
Create src/dictate/ui.py. Extract rendering from RealtimeTranscriber (stt.py lines 1086-1168):
- UiState: @dataclass(slots=True) — snapshot of all pipeline state needed for rendering
  Fields: status, partial_transcript, history (list of (str, IntentResult|None)), max_history, vad_state, buffer_seconds, queue_size, asr_ms, analysis_ms, language, vad_mode, vad_frame_ms, model_path, llm_model_name, analyze_enabled, turn_complete
- short_model_name(name: str | None) -> str — extract last path segment
- render_status_panel(state: UiState) -> Panel
- render_transcript_panel(state: UiState) -> Panel
- render_stats_panel(state: UiState) -> Panel
- render_layout(state: UiState) -> Layout
All render functions are pure: take UiState in, return Rich renderables out. No side effects.

title: Create protocols.py with TokenizerLike and FeatureExtractorLike
description:
Create src/dictate/protocols.py. Extract Protocol classes from stt.py lines 150-172. Modernize:
- Use list[int], dict[str, Any] not List/Dict
- Use collections.abc.Sequence not typing.Sequence
- Keep as Protocol classes (structural typing, no implementation)

title: Create constants.py with Final-annotated defaults
description: Create src/dictate/constants.py. Extract all DEFAULT_* constants from stt.py lines 109-119. Use typing.Final annotations. Use underscore separators in numbers (16_000). No imports beyond typing.

title: Create cli.py with argparse and main entry point
description:
Create src/dictate/cli.py. Extract from stt.py lines 1576-1688:
- build_arg_parser() -> argparse.ArgumentParser
- list_audio_devices() -> None (Rich table of input devices)
- main() -> int
main() must call setup_environment() BEFORE importing pipeline (which transitively imports MLX).
Use deferred import: import pipeline inside main() body after setup_environment().
Configure logging with RichHandler to stderr.

title: Create model/asr.py with Qwen3ASRModel composite
description:
Create src/dictate/model/asr.py. Extract from stt.py lines 678-781:
- Qwen3ASRModel(nn.Module) — composes AudioEncoder + TextModel
- get_audio_features(), __call__() with @override, make_cache(), sanitize() @staticmethod
- type Weights = dict[str, mx.array]
- Properties: layers, sample_rate
Import AudioEncoder from encoder.py, TextModel from decoder.py, ModelConfig from config.py.

title: Create model/encoder.py with audio encoder nn.Modules
description:
Create src/dictate/model/encoder.py. Extract from stt.py lines 270-547:
- SinusoidalPositionEmbedding(nn.Module)
- AudioAttention(nn.Module)
- AudioEncoderLayer(nn.Module)
- AudioEncoder(nn.Module)
Extract stateless helpers as module-level functions (not methods):
- compute_chunk_layout(feature_lens, chunk_size) -> tuple[np.ndarray, np.ndarray]
- slice_feature_chunks(...) -> list[mx.array]
- pad_chunks(...) -> tuple[mx.array, int]
- build_cu_seqlens(...) -> list[int]
Use @override on __call__ methods. Import config types from dictate.config, utils from dictate.model._utils.
